attributes.title: Pilot
attributes.caption: The Video Game Car
attributes.description: The team tries to make their lives more like video games.

attributes.title: The Video Game Car
attributes.caption: Rereleased
attributes.description: We celebrate the launch of IMMERSION with a relaunch of the pilot that started it all.

attributes.title: Online Gaming Distractions
attributes.caption: Episode 2
attributes.description: Ever wonder what effect other players have on your online gaming skills

attributes.title: Fighting Girl Clothes
attributes.caption: Episode 3
attributes.description: So how exactly do video game characters fight with the costumes they are given

attributes.title: Side Scroller
attributes.caption: Episode 4
attributes.description: Living your life as a side scrolling game might not work quite as well as it does in video games.

attributes.title: Video Game Inventory Systems
attributes.caption: Episode 5
attributes.description: We test how exactly inventory systems would work with real life physics.

attributes.title: Video Game Foods
attributes.caption: Episode 6
attributes.description: Does random food really heal the sick like it does in video games

attributes.title: Zombie Headshots
attributes.caption: Episode 7
attributes.description: So how easy is it to pickup a gun and start shooting zombies in the head

attributes.title: Horde Mode
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus, armed with a nerf arsenal, take on 400 zombies. Can they defeat the horde Find out on Immersion.
